template.name: sonarProperty
template.content: sonar.projectKey=${projectName} sonar.projectName=${projectName} sonar.projectVersion=0.0.1-SNAPSHOT sonar.sources=src sonar.language=java sonar.exclusions=**/*Example.java,**/*POMapper.java,**/*PO.java,**/ResultOf*DTO.java,**/*Test.java sonar.sourceEncoding=UTF-8
